Configuration
-------------
Describe configurations how to provide parameters and value

Basic Setup
+++++++++++

You can provide the following in ``basic.conf``

``host=ADDRESS``
  The address of the host

``port=PORT``
  The port used for signaling

  Optional. Default: ``8080``
